description:
The stinkvine weed smelled terrible, and the big tree always made fun of it. To save a girl from a demon, a traveling monk goes to find the one thing it fears, "Shippeitarou." Buhei is a man proud of his strength.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Stink Vine / Shippei-Tarou / Half-Naked Buhyou
ヘクソカズラ / しっぺい太郎 / はだか武兵
